abilita_qr.label: Enable QR
abilita_qr.info: By enabling this field, the Quick Reserve module will be displayed on the website

abilita_preview_qr.label: Enable QR Preview (Only for logged-in users)
abilita_preview_qr.info: By enabling this field, the Quick Reserve module will be displayed in test mode, visible only to logged-in users

data_apertura.label: Opening date
data_apertura.info: By setting this date, the calendar will use it as the first available date upon opening

abilita_codice_sconto_fisso.label: Enable Default Discount Code
abilita_codice_sconto_fisso.info: By enabling this field, a default discount code can be set

visibilita_codice_sconto.label: Discount Code Visibility
visibilita_codice_sconto.info: By setting this option, the discount code will be visible only on desktop, only on mobile, or on both

usa_anchor_class.label: Use QR within an anchor class
usa_anchor_class.info: By enabling this field, the Quick Reserve module will be displayed within a class

anchor_class.label: Anchor Class of QR
anchor_class.info: The class within which the Quick Reserve module is added, if the option has been selected

abilita_qr_shortcode.label: Enable QR Shortcode
abilita_qr_shortcode.info: By enabling this field, the Quick Reserve module will be displayed within a page or post using a shortcode

nome_shortcode.label: Shortcode Name
nome_shortcode.info: Name of the shortcode you wish to use to display the Quick Reserve module

campi_form.label: Form Fields
campi_form.info: You can choose the fields to display within the Quick Reserve module

colori_qr.label: QR Colors
colori_qr.info: You can customize the colors of the Quick Reserve module

colori_calendario.label: Calendar Colors
colori_calendario.info: You can customize the colors of the calendar

background_date_selezionate_calendario: Background of selected dates in calendar
testo_date_selezionate_calendario: Text of selected dates in calendar

offerte.label: Offers
offerte.info: The functionality that prints the list of special offers available for the property is automatic and is activated by inserting the placeholder [offerte] into the page or desired location. It is usually inserted in an 'Offers' page dedicated to displaying this list, which updates in real time and automatically according to the settings present on the Blastness extranet for the respective property.

css_personalizzato.label: Custom CSS
css_personalizzato.info: Insert your custom CSS here, which will be applied to the frontend.

disabilita_css_qr.label: Disable QR CSS
disabilita_css_qr.info: By enabling this field, the base CSS of the Quick Reserve module will be disabled

abilita_banner_cookie.label: Enable Cookie Banner
abilita_banner_cookie.info: By enabling this field, the cookie banner will be added

tipologia_be.label: BE Type
tipologia_be.info: The BE type is a parameter communicated by Blastness at the time of provision, based on the booking type chosen with the client. Before modifying this parameter, make sure with Blastness that a style suitable for the new type is available.

parametri_be.label: BE Parameters
parametri_be.info: BE parameters are provided by Blastness and are necessary for the correct functioning of the Quick Reserve module.

tipologia_qr.label: QR Type
tipologia_qr.info: Full-Width: full-width booking bar. Box: booking box.

posizione_qr_full_width.label: QR Full-Width Position
posizione_qr_full_width.info: By setting the values in the fields, you can determine the position of the Quick Reserve module. Leaving the 'Left' field empty and setting a value in the 'Right' field, the module will be positioned on the right; vice versa, if you leave the 'Right' field empty and set a value in the 'Left' field, the module will be positioned on the left. Similarly, by setting 'Top' and 'Bottom', you can determine the vertical position of the module

posizione_qr_box.label: QR Box Position
posizione_qr_box.info: By setting the values in the fields, you can determine the position of the Quick Reserve module. Leaving the 'Left' field empty and setting a value in the 'Right' field, the module will be positioned on the right; vice versa, if you leave the 'Right' field empty and set a value in the 'Left' field, the module will be positioned on the left. Similarly, by setting 'Top' and 'Bottom', you can determine the vertical position of the module

si_e_verificato_un_errore_riprova: An error occurred. Please try again.
